name: Baked Lemon Chicken Breasts
author: Sarah
summary: Lemon chicken baked in a wonderful lemon juice sauce. Great served over rice.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
4 (6 ounce) skin-on, bone-in chicken breasts, split
directions: Mix butter, lemon juice, paprika, oregano, garlic salt, salt, and pepper together in a bowl or resealable bag
Add chicken breasts and marinate in the refrigerator for 3 to 4 hours
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Transfer chicken to a baking dish, skin-side up
Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the centers and juices run clear, about 45 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
